translation.Contact_Us_sent: To contact us, please send an email at info [at] this domain.
translation.ReportIssueSent: If there is an issue please report or else leave it blank
translation.ClickOn: Click on the below button to upload an image from Camera / Gallery
translation.UsageGuide_1: Capture plant or leaf images in a clear and well-focused way which helps in better identification.
translation.UsageGuide_2: Try to include multiple angles incase of a plant and better use high resolution cameras to capture fine details.
translation.UsageGuide_3: Choose any model if you are not aware of them and change the model for better accuracies.
translation.UsageGuide_4: Look for the information about Indian medicinal species through our Search feature.
translation.UsageGuide_5: Your history will be saved in our application and you can use them later.
translation.UsageGuide_6: Please share your feedback on the accuracies of the prediction and it helps us to improve our model.
translation.Accuarate: How accurate is your AI Prediction?
translation.AccurateSentence: No artificial intelligence model is perfect, and we know that no such model will ever exist. However, we are confident that our machine-learning algorithms will surprise you with its accuracy.
translation.PlantIdentificationSentence: India, with a rich heritage of floral diversity, is well-known for its medicinal plant wealth, but their identification is one of the major burning issues in Ayurvedic Pharmaceutics. And hence, we made it easier with our application.
translation.AiHardWork: Let AI do the hard work
translation.AiHardWorkSentence: Every medicinal plant offers unique therapeutic properties. Find out which plant provides what benefits just by scanning.
